Dr. John Smith

Professor of Computer Science

Computer Science Department

Gates Building, Room 123, Stanford, CA 94305

Email: john.smith@university.edu

Phone: 650-555-1234

Biography

Dr. John Smith is a Professor of Computer Science specializing in artificial intelligence and machine learning. He received his PhD from MIT in 2005 and has been a faculty member since 2010. His research focuses on deep learning and natural language processing.

He has published over 100 papers in top-tier conferences and journals, and his work has been cited over 10,000 times. He is a recipient of the NSF CAREER Award and the ACM Distinguished Scientist Award.

Research Interests

  • Machine Learning
  • Natural Language Processing
  • Deep Learning
  • Computer Vision
